sources.title: Playing Politics (1936)
sources.description: Scrappy's young brother Oopie is running for President, but doesn't know anything about the issues, so he lip-syncs his speeches from a hidden "speech recorder". He winds up running into more trouble than he bargained for. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/playing-politics-1936/

metadata.Plot: Scrappy's young brother Oopie is running for President, but doesn't know anything about the issues, so he lip-syncs his speeches from a hidden "speech recorder". He winds up running into more trouble than he bargained for.
